headline: Does the Recent 15% Drop Signal an Opportunity in LyondellBasell for 2025?
summary: If you are watching LyondellBasell Industries right now and wondering whether it is finally the right time to take a position, you are not alone. Investors looking at this stock have seen quite the rollercoaster lately, and the numbers reflect it. Over just the last month, LyondellBasell has dropped by 15.5%. If you zoom out further, the declines are even starker, with a 45.0% slide over the past year and a hefty 35.9% so far in this calendar year alone. While short-term moves can sometimes...

headline: Huntsman Corporation: Is Its 12% Yield An Opportunity Or A Trap?
summary: Huntsman Corporation offers a high 12% dividend yield, but its sustainability is highly questionable due to weak financials and high leverage. See why HUN stock is a Hold.
